alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:27PM CDT until May 06 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Towanda affecting Butler County. Whitewater River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Whitewater River...including Towanda, Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Augusta. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Flood waters begin to flow over Southwest 70th Street just to the east of the river bridge loacted 3 miles northwest of Augusta and also across Southwest 60th Street near the river bridge located about 4 miles northwest of town. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:46 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Whitewater River Augusta 21.0 8.8 Wed 7 pm CDT 22.5 12.8 7.0 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
